CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 14, 1951, pg. 1, reads: "Charles - 'I fought to win the [illegible] I'll fight to retain it. Certainly I [il.]... out of the ring next Wednesday... STILL CHAMPION. Right now [il.]... into fighting conditions.  I won't predict whether it'll be a knockout of a decision, but fighting is my business...winning fights...and I expect to be in business for several years...yet!"
TitMainTitle: Boxer Ezzard Charles, seated on bed reading newspaper, possibly at training quarters in Ligonier, Pennsylvania, another version
